titleStmt.title: A proposal for improvement of husbandry and trade
titleStmt.author: Houghton, John, 1640-1705.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end of second page: John Houghton, Fellow of the Royal Society.
One of the signers of the testimonial to the author's character is Samuel Pepys.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
